content: the mini-teabag caddy crochet pattern is a delightful and functional project designed to hold your favorite teabags in style it can be crafted to match an existing crochet coaster and holder set or made as a charming standalone gift for the tea lover in your life the pattern features a delicate bloom at its center and can be personalized by adding a charm to make it uniquely yours or tailored for a special friend the caddy easily accommodates one dozen teabags the design works up quickly and is a thoughtful handmade accessory that is both beautiful and practical skill level intermediate materials yarn yarnspirations™ peaches & creme™ stripey™ green stripes or linen caddy - 31 yards hooks susan bates® 2 25 4 mm charm optional charm me® #2151389 resin coffee mug notions yarn needle scissors measuring tape place stitch marker 1 gauge 16 sts & 8 row = 4 inches in double_crochet rounds 1-12 approximately length 3 25 x width 2 75 stitch key adjustable loop bl back loop blsc back loop single_crochet blsl st back loop slip_stitch chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch or sl sts slip_stitch or slip stitches st or sts stitch or stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet yo yarn over specialty stitch 2 double_crochet cluster
